name: sfchronicle
text: Some winemakers chose not to make wines that were at risk of wildfire smoke taint, but others forged ahead. @Esther_mobley shares her experience tasting smoky wines https://t.co/lI4nxYyuoW

name: sfchronicle
text:
Central Valley Rep. Jim Costa (D-Fresno) lost his bid to chair the powerful House Agriculture Committee on Thursday, falling short of a Georgia colleague who had more seniority.

https://t.co/rxZvEeqMCq
